level_1.ability_text: Light attacks consume 10% less stamina.

level_2.ability_text: Light attacks consume 11% less stamina.

level_3.ability_text: Light attacks consume 12% less stamina.

level_1.ability_text: Attacks deal 5% more posture damage against blocking enemies.

level_2.ability_text: Attacks deal 6% more posture damage against blocking enemies.

level_3.ability_text: Attacks deal 7% more posture damage against blocking enemies.

level_1.ability_text: Backstabs deal 15% more damage.
Temporarily increases movement speed by 10% for 5 seconds.
Air attacks and blunt force attacks deal more damage.
Tap to summon a ghost that hovers near you. Tap again to send it at a target. On hit, it restores a portion of health. Max 3 active.

level_2.ability_text: Cooldown reduced. Lifesteal slightly increased.

level_1.ability_text: Increases base armor/defense by +5% (physical only). Reduces stagger impact by 10%.
+10% blocking stability (less stamina lost when blocking).
When player initiates a sprint, causes a shockwave knocking back low level enemies to escape.
Increases physical defense and blunt attack damage.
Projectiles deal +5% damage.
+10% damage vs armored enemies.
Reduces stagger duration slightly.
Slightly reduces FP cost of spells.
Light attacks deal +2% damage.
Summons a tiny wisp companion for 12s that follows the player and fires weak projectiles. (scales slightly with Mana).
While two-handing a weapon, poise damage is increased slightly.

cards.description: A gentle flower that bathes its surroundings in life-giving light, mending wounds and rejuvenating spirits.

level_1.ability_text: Summons a small sprite flower that heals 3% HP every 5s.

level_5.ability_text: Summons a small sprite flower that heals 3% HP every 5s.
level_5.description: The once gentle Sunpetal Bloom now crackles with latent energy, its petals hardened into voltaic thorns that shock any who dare to approach.

cards.descriptsion: Summons A Wasp Companion that Shocks Foes

level_1.ability_text: Summons a small electriefied wasp that deals 3minor eletric damgae.

level_5.ability_text: Summons a small sprite flower that heals 3% HP every 5s.
level_5.description: The once gentle Sunpetal Bloom now crackles with latent energy, its petals hardened into voltaic thorns that shock any who dare to approach.

level_1.ability_text: Spawns 2 spinning shields that block ranged attacks and can absorb melee hits. Each shield has 50 HP and lasts 10s.

level_2.ability_text: Spawns 2 spinning shields with 70 HP that last 12s. Shields block ranged attacks and can absorb melee hits.

level_1.ability_text: Slide forward in a chosen direction with a burst of flames, dealing moderate fire damage to enemies in the path.

level_2.ability_text: Spawns 2 spinning shields with 70 HP that last 12s. Shields block ranged attacks and can absorb melee hits.

level_1.ability_text: Weapon attacks inflict minor poison buildup.
Deal slightly more damage while under 50% health. Effect scales with missing health.
Successful parries restore 5 stamina.
Increases your physical attack damage by 2%.

level_2.ability_text: Increases your physical attack damage by 3%.

level_1.ability_text: Summons a small, cute creature that plays a trumpet to aggro nearby enemies and trigger low-level traps. Moves in a general direction for a short duration.
Restores 8% HP over 5s. (Cooldown: 90s).

level_2.ability_text: Restores 10% HP over 5s. (Cooldown: 85s).

level_1.ability_text: Creates a 3m jagged line of crystals. Each jag deals 15 piercing damage. Ends in a small crystal cluster that lingers 3s, dealing 5 damage per second.

level_2.ability_text: Line extends to 4m. Each jag deals 20 piercing damage. Cluster lingers 4s.

level_1.ability_text: Perform a fast advancing slash that parries weak projectiles.
Light attacks consume slightly less stamina while at full health. (~10%)
Reveals low-level traps in the nearby area. A flashing UI indicator alerts the player when a trap is detected.
Briefly highlights rare items, coins, and consumables in the nearby environment.
Perform two rapid dagger slashes in quick succession. High bleed buildup, low poise damage.
Spawns a glowing card above your head that illuminates the surrounding area, revealing hidden paths and dark corners.
Root yourself and blow a plasma whistle. Chips away at enemies in a narrow beam. Hold for stagger at higher levels.
Dash forward up to 3m, leaving a brief water trail. Damage the first enemy hit for light piercing damage.
Stomp the ground to release a quick wave of lightning in front of you. Deals minor electric damage and builds up stagger.
At <30% HP, gain +5% attack power.

level_2.ability_text: At <30% HP, gain +6% attack power.

level_3.ability_text: At <30% HP, gain +7% attack power.

level_1.ability_text: Deliver a drilling fist strike that pierces enemy defenses and deals minor burn damage from friction.

level_2.ability_text: Increases piercing effectiveness. Slightly raises stagger potential against armored foes.

level_3.ability_text: Strike drills deeper. Burn damage is slightly increased.

level_4.ability_text: Pierce Beyond Steel now briefly increases the player’s poise during the strike.

level_5.ability_text: Drill strike perfected. Slightly larger hitbox and burn applies more consistently.

level_1.ability_text: Deliver a wide horizontal sweep that damages and can stagger multiple enemies in front of you.

level_5.ability_text: Deliver axe a wide electrified sweep that deals bonus electric damage and can stagger multiple enemies.

level_1.ability_text: Throws a small shard of ash, dealing minor fire damage. (Mana Cost: 5)
Deliver a strong uppercut that launches light enemies slightly into the air. Moderate stamina cost.
Increases poison resistance by 10.

level_2.ability_text: Increases poison resistance by 15.

level_1.ability_text: Heavy attacks deal 10% more posture damage.

level_2.ability_text: Heavy attacks deal 12% more posture damage.

level_1.ability_text: Deliver a quick horizontal slash that slightly boosts your attack speed if it connects.

level_5.ability_text: Deliver a blazing horizontal slash that ignites enemies and increases your attack speed briefly.

level_1.ability_text: Increases item discovery by 5%.

level_2.ability_text: Increases item discovery by 7%.

level_1.ability_text: Hold to charge a heavy attack, imbuing the weapon with fire. A fully charged hit deals bonus fire damage.

level_2.ability_text: Bonus fire damage and physical scaling are slightly increased.

level_1.ability_text: Rush forward with a flurry of punches that ends in a strong finishing blow.

level_5.ability_text: Rush forward unleashing a rapid flurry of punches, ending in a powerful shockwave that staggers nearby foes.

level_1.ability_text: Swing your weapon to release a short burst of embers in front of you, dealing light fire damage in a cone.

level_5.ability_text: Release a longer burst of fire that leaves a smoldering ground effect for 2 seconds, dealing minor burn damage over time.

level_1.ability_text: Heavy attacks create a small shockwave that staggers nearby enemies within 2m radius.

level_2.ability_text: Heavy attacks create a shockwave that staggers nearby enemies within 2.2m radius.

level_3.ability_text: Heavy attacks create a shockwave that staggers nearby enemies within 2.4m radius.

level_1.ability_text: Restore 15 stamina instantly.
Gain +10% card shard drops from enemies.
+8% damage with fist weapons and daggers, +10% bonus damage on counter hits.
Critical hits have a 25% chance to poison enemies, dealing damage over time.

level_2.ability_text: Critical hits have a 30% chance to poison enemies, dealing increased damage over time.

level_3.ability_text: Critical hits have a 35% chance to poison enemies, dealing significant damage over time.

level_1.ability_text: Perform a wide, grounded sweep that deals heavy slashing damage and slightly reduces enemy defense for 5 seconds.

level_5.ability_text: Perform a fiery execution sweep, reducing enemy defense and leaving a burning trail behind.

level_1.ability_text: Increases range weapon damage and piercing damage and accuracy.
Increases damage of charged attacks.
Perform a rapid three-hit thrust combo. If all hits connect, gain brief poise damage boost.

level_5.ability_text: Perform an electrified three-hit thrust combo. Each hit deals bonus lightning damage, and the final thrust can chain to a nearby enemy.

level_1.ability_text: Slightly increases fire attack and frost resistance.
Increase to ice magic damage.
Deals +20% damage vs. Food-type enemies.
For 5 seconds, your fists are wreathed in crimson energy. Light attacks deal slightly more damage and inflict minor burn damage.
Places a hidden trap that roots enemies for 3 seconds and deals 25 piercing damage when triggered. Max 2 traps active.

level_2.ability_text: Trap damage increased to 30 and root duration extended to 3.5 seconds.

level_3.ability_text: Trap damage increased to 35, root duration to 4 seconds, and max traps increased to 3.

level_1.ability_text: Charge forward a short distance and deliver a heavy hammer slam that can knock back enemies.

level_5.ability_text: Charge forward and slam the hammer down with immense force, creating a shockwave that damages and staggers nearby enemies.

level_1.ability_text: Summons a stationary crystal sentry that fires energy projectiles at enemies within 8m range. Lasts 15 seconds.

level_2.ability_text: Sentry damage increased to 14 and attack rate improved to 1.3 seconds.

level_3.ability_text: Sentry damage increased to 16, range to 10m, and duration to 18 seconds.

level_1.ability_text: Reduces physical damage taken by 8%.

level_2.ability_text: Reduces physical damage taken by 10%.

level_3.ability_text: Reduces physical damage taken by 12%.

level_1.ability_text: Crystals erupt from the ground in a 3m radius, dealing 15 piercing damage to enemies that pass through. Lasts 4s.

level_5.ability_text: Crystals erupt from the ground in a 4m radius, dealing 25 piercing damage. After 5 enemies pass through, stored static energy discharges a lightning blast dealing 80 electric damage to all enemies in the area. Lasts 6s.

level_1.ability_text: Consecutive light attacks deal +4% more damage (stacks up to 3x).

level_2.ability_text: Consecutive light attacks deal +5% more damage (stacks up to 3x).

level_3.ability_text: Consecutive light attacks deal +6% more damage (stacks up to 3x).

level_1.ability_text: Killing an enemy restores 3% of max mana.

level_2.ability_text: Killing an enemy restores 4% of max mana.

level_3.ability_text: Killing an enemy restores 5% of max mana.

level_1.ability_text: Dash forward 4m, dealing 20 slashing damage in a line.

level_2.ability_text: Dash forward 5m, dealing 25 slashing damage in a line.

level_3.ability_text: Dash forward 6m, dealing 30 slashing damage in a line.

level_1.ability_text: When HP drops below 20%, active cards cool down reduce by 20%.
For 8 seconds, spell casts cost 15% less mana.

level_2.ability_text: For 12 seconds, spell casts cost 15% less mana.

level_3.ability_text: For 15 seconds, spell casts cost 15% less mana.

level_1.ability_text: Attacks have a 15% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 5 damage per second for 5s.
Dodging through an enemy leaves behind a venom cloud, dealing 10 poison damage over 3s.
Sacrifice 5% of max HP to gain +10% attack power until next rest.
Perform a leaping overhead slash that deals 40 damage and staggers. Cooldown 15s.
Heavy attacks cause minor bleed buildup on enemies.
For 6 seconds, weapon attacks deal minor fire damage. Cooldown: 20s.
When you kill an enemy, you lose 1% of your total HP. In return, all other enemies within a 3-meter radius take minor damage.

level_2.ability_text: Damage radius and aoe damage increased. Self-damage remains the same.

level_1.ability_text: When health is below 30%, piercing damage increases.
Releases a pulsing aura that damages nearby enemies.
Charge your rapier with pure will. Release a piercing aura that flies straight and true.

level_2.ability_text: Charge your rapier with pure will. Release a piercing aura that flies straight and true.

level_3.ability_text: Charge your rapier with pure will. Release a piercing aura that flies straight and true.

level_1.ability_text: Arms your next heavy attack with the Wolf Fang. If performed within 5 seconds, the heavy attack becomes a powerful slash, adding damage and a unique particle effect.
Significantly increases damage of air attacks and blunt force attacks.

cards.card_name: Lantern Saint of the Endless Steps

level_1.ability_text: Summons the Lantern Saint for 8 seconds, dealing continuous fire AoE damage in a small radius around him
Restore 10% of your max mana (or FP equivalent) upon defeating an enemy.
Upon tap, player disappears and reappears in a roll direction.
Instantly transforms the player into a luchador stance. Weapons/wands are disabled. Light/heavy attacks become wrestling moves for 10s.

level_2.ability_text: El Lucha form extended. Unlocks running tackle as a light attack finisher.

level_3.ability_text: El Lucha form grows stronger. Unlocks German suplex as a heavy attack finisher.

level_4.ability_text: El Lucha form empowers further. Adds flying elbow drop as an aerial heavy attack.

level_5.ability_text: El Lucha becomes unstoppable. Duration increased and poise resistance is boosted while active.

level_1.ability_text: Fires 2 quick projectiles in an arc, hitting multiple enemies
Chains and lab equipment rise from the ground, releasing electrical arcs that deal 40 instant damage and 15 damage per second for 6s to enemies in a 3m radius.

level_2.ability_text: Enhanced lab hazard: chains and machines release stronger electrical arcs dealing 60 instant damage and 25 damage per second for 8s to enemies in a 3.5m radius.

level_1.ability_text: Reduces enemy detection range by 30% and increases backstab damage by 20%. Movement is completely silent.

level_2.ability_text: Reduces enemy detection range by 35% and increases backstab damage by 25%. Movement is completely silent.

level_3.ability_text: Reduces enemy detection range by 40% and increases backstab damage by 30%. Movement is completely silent.

level_4.ability_text: Reduces enemy detection range by 45% and increases backstab damage by 35%. Movement is completely silent.

level_5.ability_text: Reduces enemy detection range by 50% and increases backstab damage by 40%. Movement is completely silent. Critical hits have a chance to temporarily stun enemies.

level_1.ability_text: Releases a fast lightning breath that chains between enemies. More DPS but lower per-hit damage. Quick activation and stamina-friendly.
Tap to charge your spear with dragon energy. Your next heavy attack unleashes a spectral dragon thrust that pierces through all enemies in a line. If not used within 6 seconds, the charge fades.
Creates a graveyard area that spawns coffins and headstones. Coffins slow enemies, headstones poison them. Area blocks enemy movement within 3m radius for 10 seconds.

Summons the Garygomites, a trio of tiny elemental gargoyles, for 10s. Ignit (Fire) deals minor burn. Volt (Electric) emits a shock pulse every 4s. Chillip (Frost) slows targets by 20% on hit. They share a group HP pool.

level_2.ability_text: Increases group HP to 140. Ignit's burn damage increases. Volt pulses every 3.5s. Chillip slow increased to 25%.

level_3.ability_text: Increases duration to 12s. Volt's pulse damage increased. Chillip slow lasts longer. Fire burn duration increased.

level_1.ability_text: Summon 4 phantom copies of yourself. These phantoms will automatically absorb the next 4 projectiles or melee attacks aimed at you. Phantoms last for 20 seconds.

level_2.ability_text: Summon 4 phantom copies of yourself. These phantoms will absorb the next 4 projectiles or melee attacks. Duration increased.

level_3.ability_text: Summon 5 phantom copies of yourself. These phantoms will absorb the next 5 projectiles or melee attacks. Duration increased and cooldown reduced.

level_1.ability_text: Release pulsing auro status effect and fire off devouring phantoms that if land consume health points to add to your own health points.
Summons a gravitational field in a 4m radius. Enemies inside are pulled toward the center at 2 m/s and take 25 damage per second while inside the field. Lasts 8s.

level_2.ability_text: Gravitational field intensifies: enemies pulled at 3 m/s and take 35 damage per second. Lasts 10s.

level_1.ability_text: Immediately swaps this card with the top card of the Carry Deck. Grants 3s of minor Defense/Poise, and the incoming card gains 15% power for 5s.

level_2.ability_text: Swap effect: Defense/Poise duration 3.5s. Incoming card gains 17% power for 5s.

level_3.ability_text: Swap effect: Defense/Poise duration 4.0s. Incoming card gains 19% power for 6s.

level_4.ability_text: Swap effect: Defense/Poise duration 4.5s. Incoming card gains 20% power for 6s. Cooldown reduced by 3s.

level_5.ability_text: Swap effect: Defense/Poise duration 5.0s. Incoming card gains 25% power for 7s. Cooldown reduced by 5s total.

level_1.ability_text: Summons a massive elephant ribcage from the ground, creating a bone barrier with 300 HP that blocks melee and ranged attacks. Barrier visibly fractures as it takes damage. Lasts 15s.

level_2.ability_text: Summons a reinforced elephant ribcage with 400 HP that lasts 18s. Barrier fractures and crumbles as damage is taken.

level_1.ability_text: Charges a massive fire AOE cone attack with high raw damage. Slower charge but overwhelming power.
Charges a massive fire AOE cone attack with high raw damage. Slower charge but overwhelming power.
Sacrifice a portion of HP. For the next 10 seconds, axe attacks deal massive bonus damage to enemies below 25% health.

Summons 3 dark pillars that slam into the ground, dealing 50 impact damage on arrival. Pillars emit a burning aura that deals 20 fire damage per second to enemies inside. After 10s, pillars collapse with a burst of 100 burn damage.

level_2.ability_text: Summons 3 reinforced dark pillars that slam into the ground, dealing 70 impact damage. Pillars emit stronger burning aura (30 fire damage per second). After 12s, collapse with a burst of 120 burn damage.

level_1.ability_text: Perform the Dregthorn shotgun sequence: First blast fires downward, propelling the player upward while dealing close-range damage.

level_2.ability_text: Adds the second shot to the sequence: While airborne, fire directly at the target below for additional damage.

level_3.ability_text: Completes the sequence: A third shotgun blast pushes the player backward on landing, dealing damage and creating space.

level_4.ability_text: Dregthorn mastery: Slightly reduces stamina cost per blast and increases aerial control during the sequence.

level_5.ability_text: Specialist perfected: Sequence damage increased and final blast creates a small stagger shockwave on impact.

level_1.ability_text: After killing an enemy, gain +15% Attack and Defense for 30s. Stacks up to 3 times.
Weapons unequipped. Light attack becomes pixel punch/kick combo. Heavy attack becomes Glitch Slam — a blocky sprite fist drop.

level_2.ability_text: Gains Sprite Dash attack. Heavy attacks now knock back enemies like an arcade beat-’em-up hit.

level_3.ability_text: Light attacks leave after-image pixels. Heavy attack fires a short-range Glitch Beam of corrupted sprites.

level_4.ability_text: Boss Mode. Dave flashes red like an NES boss. Light attacks form a punch–kick–jump kick chain. Heavy attack launches a massive pixelated fireball.

level_5.ability_text: Final Cartridge. Transforms into Retro Dave, glowing with pixel energy. Light attacks become rapid button-mash combos. Heavy attack triggers Screen Clear — a full-screen glitch explosion.

level_1.ability_text: When your health drops below 25%, all equipped cards gain a temporary +1 level boost for 8 seconds.Once the effect ends, this card enters a 60-second cooldown before it can trigger again

level_2.ability_text: Gains Sprite Dash attack. Heavy attacks now knock back enemies like an arcade beat-’em-up hit.

level_3.ability_text: Light attacks leave after-image pixels. Heavy attack fires a short-range Glitch Beam of corrupted sprites.

level_4.ability_text: Boss Mode. Dave flashes red like an NES boss. Light attacks form a punch–kick–jump kick chain. Heavy attack launches a massive pixelated fireball.

level_5.ability_text: Final Cartridge. Transforms into Retro Dave, glowing with pixel energy. Light attacks become rapid button-mash combos. Heavy attack triggers Screen Clear — a full-screen glitch explosion.

level_1.ability_text: Casting spells briefly reduces poise damage taken.
Ground slam sends a short frost shockwave. Gain frost buildup buff.

level_2.ability_text: Shockwave travels further and slightly staggers enemies. Frost buildup bonus increased.

level_3.ability_text: Upon buff end, a frost burst erupts around you, dealing small AoE Frost damage. Maximum Frost buildup bonus.

level_1.ability_text: When HP drops below 20%, gain +50% Attack Power. Take +15% more damage while active.
A powerful, game-changing ability related to summoning the hand of golden judgment to do devastating damage and transforming enemies or objects into the finast and most brilliant sentencing.
A daring & risky final charge to do devasting amount of damge on a target enemy

special: Massive laser beam descends from orbital ring

cards.flavor_text: From the heavens descends the circle of judgment, its light burning away all resistance. Few have seen it fire twice.

level_1.ability_text: Massive laser beam descends from orbital ring, Obliterates most standard enemies instantly, Heavy stagger effect on bosses

special: Massive laser beam descends from orbital ring

cards.flavor_text: From the heavens descends the circle of judgment, its light burning away all resistance. Few have seen it fire twice.
A dark power that feeds on life to dismantle the will of even the mightiest foes.

level_1.ability_text: Requires a melee hit. Upon striking a boss, you sacrifice 10% of your maximum health. The boss cannot use its two most powerful abilities for 20 seconds. This effect can only be triggered once per boss fight.
